articles.description: This week’s Paris air show was a showcase of fuel-saving developments but critics say fleet growth will offset gains
articles.content: The workhorse plane of the future may look radically different to the familiar shape that has dominated the skies since the start of the jet age, according to Boeing, which is experimenting with a lo… [+6358 chars]
